verses.verse: Now <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> had <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>; and he joined <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with <S%H256>Ahab<s%>.

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1875>Inquire<s%> <S%H3117>first<s%>, I pray <S%H1697>thee<s%>, for the word of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

But <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Is there not here a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1875>besides<s%>, that we may inquire of him?

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>, There is yet <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by whom we may <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: but I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H5012>him<s%>; for he never prophesieth <S%H2896>good<s%> concerning <S%H3117>me<s%>, but always <S%H7451>evil<s%>: the same is <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3229>Imla<s%>. Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne<s%>, <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> in their <S%H899>robes<s%>, and they were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in an open <S%H1637>place<s%> at the <S%H8179>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>; and all the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3668>Chenaanah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, With these shalt thou <S%H5055>push<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>, until they be <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.

And <S%H4321>Micaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, what my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, that will I <S%H1696>speak<s%>.

And when he was <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4318>him<s%>, Micaiah, shall we <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, or shall I <S%H2308>forbear<s%>? And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6471>him<s%>, How many times shall I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> thee that thou <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto me nothing but the <S%H571>truth<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H7200>saw<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that have no <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>: and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, These have no <S%H113>master<s%>; let them <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>, Did I not <S%H559>tell<s%> thee that he would not <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> concerning <S%H7451>me<s%>, but evil?

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Who shall <S%H6601>entice<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that he may go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> at <S%H7433>Ramoth-gilead<s%>? And one <S%H559>spake<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> after this <S%H3602>manner<s%>, and another <S%H559>saying<s%> after that <S%H3602>manner<s%>.

And there came <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H6601>entice<s%> <S%H3068>him<s%>. And Jehovah said unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Wherewith?

and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H7760>Put<s%> this fellow in the <S%H1004>prison<s%>, and <S%H398>feed<s%> him with <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H3906>affliction<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3906>affliction<s%>, until I <S%H7725>return<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
